body.p: The Wine development release 1.5.2 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Improved naming scheme for audio devices.
Better support for finding system fonts on Mac OS X.
Beginnings of support for JPEG encoding.
Several printing fixes.
Improvements to the URL cache.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
